mapper.sql: teacher_info_id, teacher_name, teacher_sex, teacher_birthday, teacher_phonenumber, college_id
mapper.insert: insert into teacher_info (teacher_info_id, teacher_name, teacher_sex, teacher_birthday, teacher_phonenumber, college_id, other) values (#{teacherInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{teacherPhonenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{other,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into teacher_info
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS teacher_info_id
teacher_info_id,
teacher_name,
teacher_sex,
teacher_birthday,
teacher_phonenumber,
college_id,
other,
#{teacherInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{teacherSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{teacherBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{teacherPhonenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update teacher_info
teacher_name = #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teacher_sex = #{teacherSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teacher_birthday = #{teacherBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
teacher_phonenumber = #{teacherPhonenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
college_id = #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
other = #{other,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where teacher_info_id = #{teacherInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update teacher_info set teacher_name = #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_sex = #{teacherSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_birthday = #{teacherBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, teacher_phonenumber = #{teacherPhonenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, college_id = #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, other = #{other,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where teacher_info_id = #{teacherInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update teacher_info set teacher_name = #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_sex = #{teacherSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_birthday = #{teacherBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, teacher_phonenumber = #{teacherPhonenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, college_id = #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where teacher_info_id = #{teacherInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT c.teacher_name,c.teacher_sex,c.teacher_birthday,c.teacher_phonenumber FROM account a LEFT JOIN teacher b ON a.account_id = b.account_id LEFT JOIN teacher_info c ON b.teacher_info_id = c.teacher_info_id WHERE a.account_id = #{accountId}
